channel.title: Posts on Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ramblings

item.title: Minikube w/ cert manager
item.description: Using cert manager with Minikube Create your Root CA and key openssl genrsa -out rootCAKey-kong.pem 2048 openssl req -x509 -sha256 -new -nodes -key rootCAKey-kong.pem -days 3650 -out rootCACert-kong.pem Import the CA into your browser or OS trust store Install Cert Manager kubectl apply -f https://github.com/cert-manager/cert-manager/releases/download/v1.9.1/cert-manager.yaml Create a secret in the cert-manager namespace to hold your root CA kubectl create secret tls rootca --key="rootCAKey-kong.
